response.job_title: Full-stack developer, Symfony fan, always looking to learn and improve.
response.summary: Autodidactic full-stack developer with 4+ years of experience with emphasis on the back-end with different technologies, currently focused on PHP, Symfony for the back-end and JavaScript, HTML, CSS for the front-end and 2+ years working remotely for clients in the United States. Purposeful, observing the needs around me looking for efficient solutions. Always looking to learn more about web development technologies, programming and teamwork methodologies.
response.skills: Desarrollo de sitios web, Automatización industrial, Programación, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Matlab, Microsoft Word, Trabajo en equipo, Inglés, Protocolos de comunicación industrial

profile_positions.description:
Worked remotely from Colombia, for clients in the United States, with coworkers also located remotely. The activities of the clients are varied, but with the characteristic of being companies without a digital identity, which was built by creating presentation websites and other actions.

I established a digital database by creating 2500+ leads for a client through a proprietary developed CRM, proposed by me after observing the needs of the client, enabling the possibility of email, SMS, and different marketing campaigns, using Symfony, Twig, JavaScript, HTML & CSS.

Likewise, developed 5+ websites to create a digital identity increasing the number of clients and touch points for multiple clients, using WordPress in some of them, and others with the same previous stack.
profile_positions.title: Full-stack Developer

profile_positions.description:
During the time of this experience I worked on web development, improving existing apps and creating new ones but also worked with industrial automation, electrical design and other industrial areas, mostly regarding water supply industrial plants.

I implemented, on my own initiative, a better responsive and more attractive front-end interface generating better impressions of the products on clients and directives helping to close multiple deals. 

Also developed, by own initiative, a standardized methodology for repetitive websites reducing development times, using C#, JavaScript, HTML & CSS.
profile_positions.title: Development Engineer

company.name: ScotiaTech
company.description:
Somos un grupo de ingeniería de clase mundial.
Tenemos el propósito diario de modernizar la tecnología bancaria, buscando entregar un servicio confiable, único y de alta calidad.​
Nuestro equipo es inclusivo, diverso y de pensamiento divergente en donde todos pueden alcanzar su máximo potencial, son respetados por ser quienes son y se aceptan sus diferencias y similitudes.
Somos la Unidad de tecnología de GBS/GSG Colombia del grupo Scotiabank.
